import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const Slider = () => { let key = "e9ffcce562635a23124ca8069487f842"; const [movie, setMovie] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`https://api.themoviedb.org/3/discover/movie?api_key=${key}`) .then((res) => res.data) .then((data) => setMovie(data.results)); }, []); return (
{ movie.map((peli, i) => { return (

); }; export default Slider;
